entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who is helping Harry. She is mentioned as saying 'You'd better put that Cloak back on'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in this scene. He is mentioned as swinging the Cloak back over himself.

entities.name: cloak
entities.description: The Cloak is an object that Harry and Tonks are using to travel. It is mentioned as being put back on by Harry.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A Patronus is a magical creature that can be used for communication. It is mentioned as being sent by Tonks.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is mentioned as sending messages like the Patronus.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: The castle is a location where Tonks is sending word to. It is mentioned as being worried about Harry's safety.

relationships.description: Tonks is helping Harry by sending a Patronus to the castle.
Tonks is informing the castle that she has found Harry.
